ExpSyntax.val: RqHTTPHeader ('Content-type: text/csv','Content-Disposition: attachment; filename='&Trim (Str ({0,3},''))&'_'&Trim (Str ({0,4},''))&'_LOCs.csv', 'Cache-Control: private, max-age=15')
RqHTTPHeader ('Content-type: text/csv','Content-Disposition: attachment; filename='&Trim (Str ({0,3},''))&'_'&Trim (Str ({0,4},''))&'_DIs.csv', 'Cache-Control: private, max-age=15')

'EXISTS (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/cflc b where b.CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED=LCHD_ADMNO and b.CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED=LCHD_CLNTNO and b.CFLC_ADMNO='&Trim (Str ({0,3},''))&' and b.CFLC_CLNTNO='&Trim (Str ({0,4},''))&' and b.CFLC_USRID='''&Trim ({0,5})&''')'

'EXISTS (select * from '&Trim ({32768,9})&'/cflc b where b.CFLC_ADMNOALLOWED=DCHD_ADMNO and b.CFLC_CLNTNOALLOWED=DCHD_CLNTNO and b.CFLC_ADMNO='&Trim (Str ({0,3},''))&' and b.CFLC_CLNTNO='&Trim (Str ({0,4},''))&' and b.CFLC_USRID='''&Trim ({0,5})&''')'
Trim ({0,16})&' AND LCHD_DATETERMINATION IS NOT NULL'
Trim ({0,16})&' AND DCHD_DATETERMINATION IS NOT NULL'
